Author: littlemissbones
Text: I don’t blame you for feeling distressed and upset- but I’m so proud of you for quitting drugs!!!! Your body is probably ecstatic and Uber grateful to you right now- it’s craving all the food it’s been denied for so long! Every chocolate is an act of self-compassion, of self-care, a step towards a long and satisfying life. You deserve it, and you’re strong enough to reach it.
